articles.title: New report shows Australia's net migration rates recovering to pre-pandemic levels - SBS
articles.description: After years of border closures and travel restrictions, Australia's net migration rates are returning to pre-pandemic levels. A snapshot of population data set to be released, indicate Australia is to see migration rebound this year.
articles.content: The new data shows net migration should reach the pre-pandemic level of 235,000 by the end of this financial year (2022-23), and remain steady. Source: AAP / DEAN LEWINS/AAPIMAGE
